item.title: Sderot-based nonprofit launches 24/7 monitoring for farms, improving security
item.description:
Sderot-based nonprofit launches 24/7 monitoring for farms, improving security A new initiative in Sderot provides 24/7 monitoring for remote farms, reducing response times for theft, vandalism, and other security incidents. Sderot is providing 24/7 monitoring for dozens of remote farms and open areas, aiming to cut response times to incidents that include theft, vandalism, arson and suspected infiltrations, according to the nonprofit behind the initiative.
